attributes.title: Book with No Introduction || Part 1 || Shiva Sutras || 13 July 2006
attributes.description:
Name Of The Program : Shiva Sutras Part 1
Session on: Book with No Introduction
Date : 13 July 2006
Venue : Adikailaasa, Bidadi, Bengaluru

In this video Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism HDH #Nithyananda Paramashivam gives an detailed explanation on the Book Shiva #Sutras. This is an video excerpt on Shiva Sutras conducted on 13 July 2006 in Adikailaasa, Bidadi, Bengaluru. Here HDH also explains the various techniques that Lord #Shiva gives to Devi Parvati. 

Watch more:
Part 2: https://youtu.be/qv7fVLwiOc8   
Part 3: https://youtu.be/tB02zCXn7Qw   
Part 4: https://youtu.be/7wBCBxcyjFs   
Part 5: https://youtu.be/Ze_y_2M6TFY    
Part 6: https://youtu.be/gW0FsGhFYkM
